mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER SOF INNER JOIN BOARD_INTEREST BI ON (SOF.FolderID = BI.FolderID) WHERE 1=1 AND BI.RegisterCode=#{userCode} AND SOF.IsUse='Y' AND SOF.DeleteDate IS NULL

SELECT RESULT.FolderID AS "FolderID" , RESULT.MultiDisplayName AS "MultiDisplayName" , RESULT.FolderPath AS "FolderPath" , RESULT.RegistDate AS "RegistDate" FROM ( SELECT SOF.FolderID, SOF.MultiDisplayName, FN_FOLDERPATHBYLANGGET_S(#{lang}, SOF.FolderPath) AS FolderPath, BI.RegistDate FROM SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER SOF INNER JOIN BOARD_INTEREST BI ON (SOF.FolderID = BI.FolderID) WHERE 1=1 AND BI.RegisterCode=#{userCode} AND SOF.IsUse='Y' AND SOF.DeleteDate IS NULL ) RESULT WHERE 1=1
AND ROWNUM BETWEEN #{pageSize} AND #{pageOffset}
MultiDisplayName FolderPath RegistDate FolderID
ASC DESC

SELECT BU.UserFormID AS "UserFormID", BU.FolderID AS "FolderID", BU.SortKey AS "SortKey", BU.FieldType AS "FieldType", BU.FieldSize AS "FieldSize", BU.FieldLimitCnt AS "FieldLimitCnt", BU.IsList AS "IsList", BU.IsOption AS "IsOption", NVL(BU.IsCheckVal, 'N') AS "IsCheckVal", BU.IsSearchItem AS "IsSearchItem", FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, FieldName) AS "FieldName", (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_USERFORM_OPTION WHERE UserFormID=BU.UserFormID AND FolderID=#{folderID}) AS "OptionCnt" FROM BOARD_USERFORM BU WHERE BU.FolderID=#{folderID} AND BU.DeleteDate IS NULL
AND IsList = 'Y'
ORDER BY SortKey ASC

SELECT OptionID AS "OptionID", UserFormID AS "UserFormID", FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, OptionName) AS "OptionName", OptionValue AS "OptionValue" FROM BOARD_USERFORM_OPTION WHERE UserFormID = #{userFormID} ORDER BY SortKey ASC

SELECT FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, NVL(MultiDisplayName, DisplayName)) AS "DisplayName" FROM SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER WHERE 1=1 AND FolderID IN
#{item}

SELECT optionValue AS "optionValue" , (ParentFolderName||'-'||optionText) AS "optionText" , FolderID AS "FolderID" , FolderType AS "FolderType" , DisplayName AS "DisplayName" , MemberOf AS "MemberOf" ,ParentFolderName AS "ParentFolderName" FROM ( SELECT SOF.FolderID AS optionValue , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, NVL(SOF.MultiDisplayName,SOF.DisplayName)) AS optionText , SOF.FolderPath , SOF.SortKey , SOF.FolderID , SOF.FolderType , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, NVL(SOF.MultiDisplayName,SOF.DisplayName)) AS DisplayName , SOF.MemberOf , Fn_BaseGetDictionary_S(#{lang}, NVL(SOFD.MultiDisplayName,SOFD.DisplayName)) AS ParentFolderName FROM SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER SOF LEFT JOIN SYS_OBJECT_DOMAIN SOD ON SOF.DomainID = SOD.DomainID INNER JOIN SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER SOFD ON SOF.MemberOf = SOFD.FolderID WHERE SOF.DomainID IN (0, #{domainID})
AND SOF.MenuID = #{communityID} AND SOF.ObjectType = 'Community'
AND SOF.MenuID = #{menuID} AND SOF.ObjectType = #{bizSection}
AND SOF.DeleteDate IS NULL AND SOF.FolderType NOT IN ('Root', 'Folder', 'QuickComment') AND SOF.IsUse = 'Y' AND SOF.IsDisplay = 'Y' ) RESULT ORDER BY
CASE WHEN FolderID = #{folderID} THEN 0 ELSE 1 END,
FolderPath, SortKey ASC

SELECT A.CategoryID AS "optionValue" , A.FolderID AS "FolderID" , NVL(A.MemberOf, 0) AS "MemberOf" ,(SELECT COUNT(CategoryID) FROM BOARD_CATEGORY WHERE MemberOf = A.CategoryID) AS "NodeCount" , A.CategoryPath AS "CategoryPath" , (CASE WHEN A.MemberOf IS NULL THEN '' ELSE '┗' END ) || FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, A.DisplayName) AS "optionText" , A.SortKey AS "SortKey" , A.SortPath AS "SortPath" FROM BOARD_CATEGORY A WHERE A.FolderID = #{folderID} ORDER BY SortPath ASC

SELECT A.optionText AS "optionText" , A.optionValue AS "optionValue" FROM ( SELECT FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, FormName) AS optionText, BodyFormID AS optionValue FROM BOARD_BODYFORM WHERE 1=1 AND folderID = #{folderID} AND IsInit = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, FormName) AS optionText, BodyFormID AS optionValue FROM BOARD_BODYFORM WHERE 1=1 AND folderID = #{folderID} AND IsInit = 'N'
)A
SELECT FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang},MultiDeptName) AS "optionText" , DeptCode AS "optionValue" FROM SYS_OBJECT_USER_BASEGROUP WHERE UserCode = #{userCode}
SELECT StateID AS "optionValue" ,FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, DisplayName) AS "optionText" FROM BOARD_PROGRESSSTATE WHERE FolderID = #{folderID} ORDER BY SortKey ASC
SELECT NVL(IsMobileSupport, 'N') AS "isMobileSupport" FROM sys_object_folder WHERE 1=1 AND FolderID = #{folderID}

SELECT SOF.FolderID AS "FolderID" ,SOF.MemberOf AS "MemberOf" ,SOF.FolderType AS "FolderType" ,SOF.FolderType AS "FolderType" ,SOF.FolderPath AS "FolderPath" ,SOF.MenuID AS "MenuID" ,( CONCAT('board_',SOF.FolderType) )AS "type" ,NVL(FN_BASEGETDICTIONARY_S(#{lang}, SOF.MultiDisplayName), SOF.DisplayName ) AS "FolderName" ,SOF.MemberOf AS "MemberOf" ,SOF.DisplayName AS "DisplayName" ,SOF.SortPath AS "SortPath" ,(SELECT COUNT(0) FROM SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER self WHERE self.MemberOf=sof.FolderID AND self.IsUse = 'Y' AND self.DeleteDate IS NULL) AS "hasChild" ,(DECODE(INSTR(SOF.OwnerCode, ''),0,'N', 'Y')) AS "OwnerFlag" FROM SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER SOF LEFT JOIN SYS_OBJECT_DOMAIN SOD ON SOF.DomainID = SOD.DomainID WHERE (SOF.MenuID = #{menuID} OR SOF.DomainID = 0) AND SOF.ObjectType = #{bizSection} AND SOF.DeleteDate IS NULL AND SOF.IsUse = 'Y' AND SOF.IsDisplay = 'Y' AND (NOT REGEXP_LIKE (SOF.FolderPath, (SELECT LISTAGG(FolderID, ';|') WITHIN GROUP ( ORDER BY FolderID) FROM SYS_OBJECT_FOLDER WHERE (IsUse = 'N' OR IsDisplay = 'N')) ) OR SOF.FolderPath IS NULL)
AND SOF.FolderID IN
#{item}
ORDER BY SOF.MenuID, SOF.FolderPath NULLS FIRST, SOF.SortKey ASC
